description: These Japanese emoticons are so hungry you can see the drool dripping from their mouths. ཀ Makes a perfect drooling mouth, and you can also use ཫ`, ﹎᷊, ༎, or the English letter q. They must be imagining a delicious meal or staring at someone’s chocolate cake. Whatever it is, they are in a trance over it and probably don’t even realise they are drooling! title: Drooling with hunger
